title: Ubuntu系统Forge安装后无效果
author: AccelWorld
txt_content:
我装的是Ubuntu系统，安装了1.6.2的Forge，可是和没装一样，还是原版。下的懒人包也没有用，我是用sh脚本启动的，java安装正常，高清修复可正常运行，natives已替换，求大神指点。
下面是我启动用的sh脚本内容

#!/bin/bash
# The shell script is used to run 
# Minecraft v1.6.2 on linux.

# Before running this,you'd ensure
# that you have installed Java Runtime Environment(JRE)
# and Minecraft v1.6.2 .

MC_ROOT=~/.minecraft
MC_VERSION=Forge[1.6.2]

java -Djava.library.path=$MC_ROOT/natives -cp $MC_ROOT/libraries/net/sf/jopt-simple/jopt-simple/4.5/jopt-simple-4.5.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/paulscode/codecjorbis/20101023/codecjorbis-20101023.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/paulscode/codecwav/20101023/codecwav-20101023.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/paulscode/libraryjavasound/20101123/libraryjavasound-20101123.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/paulscode/librarylwjglopenal/20100824/librarylwjglopenal-20100824.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/paulscode/soundsystem/20120107/soundsystem-20120107.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/org/lwjgl/lwjgl/lwjgl/2.9.0/lwjgl-2.9.0.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/org/lwjgl/lwjgl/lwjgl_util/2.9.0/lwjgl_util-2.9.0.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/argo/argo/2.25_fixed/argo-2.25_fixed.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/org/bouncycastle/bcprov-jdk15on/1.47/bcprov-jdk15on-1.47.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/google/guava/guava/14.0/guava-14.0.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/org/apache/commons/commons-lang3/3.1/commons-lang3-3.1.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/commons-io/commons-io/2.4/commons-io-2.4.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/net/java/jinput/jinput/latest/jinput-latest.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/net/java/jutils/jutils/1.0.0/jutils-1.0.0.jar:$MC_ROOT/libraries/com/google/code/gson/gson/2.2.2/gson-2.2.2.jar:$MC_ROOT/versions/$MC_VERSION/$MC_VERSION.jar  net.minecraft.client.main.Main --username zky2013 --version $MC_VERSION --gameDir $MC_ROOT --assetsDir $MC_ROOT/assets
